Hospital.World

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.World.Time
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasTime, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<HasTime>

    public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
implements HasTime, java.lang.Cloneable
    This object holds a date and time and defines some useful functions on them.

        public Time(int year,
    int month,
    int day,
    int hour,
    int minute)
        Constructor for a given time and date.
        Parameters:
        year - the year to set
        month - the month to set
        day - the day of the month to set
        hour - the hour to set
        minute - the minutes into the hour to set

      • Time

        public Time(int[] numbers)
     throws ArgumentIsNullException,
            WrongArgumentListException
        Constructor for a given time and date.
        Parameters:
        numbers - The times to set, positions 0 to 4 are respectively year, month, day, hour, minute;
        Throws:
        ArgumentIsNullException - the given array of numbers was null
        WrongArgumentListException - the right amount of numbers was not given

        public int compareTo(HasTime t)
        Compares this object to another Time object
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<HasTime>
        Parameters:
        t - the other object to compare to
        Returns:
        0 if t represents the same time as this object. less than 0 if this object comes before t in time more than 0 if this object comes after t in time

      • getDiffTime

        public Time getDiffTime(int year,
               int month,
               int day,
               int hour,
               int minute)
        Gives back a moment later in time.
        Parameters:
        year - amount of years to be added
        month - amount of months to be added
        day - amount of days to be added
        hour - amount of hours to be added
        minute - amount of minutes to be added
        Returns:
        a new Time-object representing a time later than the time in this object, as specified by the parameters
